text: Alain Bouffard (born 24 September 1939) is a French coxswain. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's eight where they came fourth. ==References== == External links == * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nantes Category:Coxswains (rowing) Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for France Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Alain Bouffard
